alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 22 at 4:20AM EST until November 22 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...1 to locally 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield and Southern New Haven Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester and Bronx Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor to localized moderate flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/07 AM 10.1/10.6 2.2/ 2.7 2.3/ 2.8 1-2 MINOR 22/07 PM 7.5/ 8.0 -0.3/ 0.2 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE 23/08 AM 8.6/ 9.1 0.8/ 1.3 0.6/ 1.1 2 NONE 23/08 PM 8.3/ 8.8 0.5/ 1.0 1.0/ 1.5 2 NONE 24/08 AM 9.0/ 9.5 1.2/ 1.7 0.7/ 1.1 0-1 NONE 24/09 PM 7.8/ 8.4 0.1/ 0.6 0.5/ 1.0 0-1 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
